maqras.text: 94|1|tae yeung minban baekchamh troung robsa anak( mou ham meat) aoy anak
94|2|ning ban dk bantouk robsa anak chenhpi anak
94|3|del ban phtok yeang thngon now leu khnang robsa anak
94|4|haey yeung ban leuk ke tde neam robsa anak aoy khpangkhpasa te ryy
94|5|haey pitabrakd nasa  cheamuoynung sechakdei lombak vetnea  ku pheap ngeayosruol .
94|6|pitabrakd nasa  cheamuoynung se ch kei  d lombak vetnea ku pheap  ngeayosruol .
94|7|dau che  neah  nowpel del anak ban bampenhphearkechch(kechchakar  lokey) ruochreal haey  chaur anak khetkham korp sakkar champoh yeung .
94|8|haey tow champoh mcheasa robsa anak temuoyokt  chaur anak bng  brathnea ning sangkhum .
95|1|a l laoh sbath nung phle ti n( phle lvea) ning hsaai toun ( phle au liv) .
95|2|ning phnom tour sai na .
95|3|ning tikrong nih( mea kkah) del brakabdaoy sokh sa ndi pheap .
95|4|chea karpit nasa  yeung ban bangkeut mnoussa lok sthet knong  trongtreay muoy da la brasaer bamphot .
95|5|banteabmk yeung ban banhchoun puokke tralb towkean kanleng  del teab cheangke bamphot( bat nork) .
95|6|leuklengte banda anak del mean chomnue ning ban sang ampeu  la troemotrauv  ku puokke nung ttuol ban phalbony chea ni r nd  .
95|7|dau che  neah  banteabpi nih tow  tae ei  v del thveu aoy anak( mnoussa lok)  bdeseth nung thngai chomnoumchomreah( thngai barlok) noh
95|8|tae a l laoh minmen chea anak katsechakdei da brasaer bamphot  cheang anak katsechakdei teanglay te ryy
96|1|chaur anak( mou ham meat) sautr knongnam mcheasa robsa anak del ban  bangkeut( nouv avei  teangoasa) choh .
96|2|trong ban bangkeut mnoussa lok pi kam am n k chheam muoy dom .
96|3|chaur anak sautr choh  haey mcheasa robsa anak mha sabborsa
96|4|del trong ban bangrien( kar sarser) daoy slab ba ka .
96|5|trong ban bangrien mnoussa lok nouv avei delke minban doeng .
96|6|te.  karpit mnoussa lok ku pitchea bampean( leu chbab robsa  a l laoh)
96|7|daoysaar ke ylkheunh tha  khuo  l n ke mean krobkrean haey .
96|8|pitabrakd nasa  kanleng vilotralb  ku chhpaoh towkean mcheasa  robsa anak .
96|9|tae anak( mou ham meat) bankheunh anak del( a pou cha ha l)  hamkhat
96|10|khnhom robsa a l laoh( mou ham meat) nowpel delke sa lat  te ryy
96|11|tae anak ylkheunh yeang dauch me  dch  brasenbae ke( khnhom robsa  a l laoh) sthetnow leu meakra da troemotrauv
96|12|ryy ke ban brae knea aoy kaotakhlach a l laoh noh
96|13|tae anak( mou ham meat) ylkheunh yeang dauch me  d ch der brasen  bae ke( a pou cha ha l) ban bdeseth ning berchenh( pi chomnue) noh
96|14|tae ke( a pou cha ha l) mindoeng te ryytha  a l laoh pitchea kheunh( tongveu robsa ke) noh
96|15|phtoytowvinh.  brasenbae ke minochhb bampean te noh yeung  nung chab kbal robsa ke rounh tomleak tow knong nork cheaminkhan  .
96|16|ku kbal anak del phout kohk  ning sang babakamm .
96|17|dau che  neah  chaur anak aoy ke srekhaw krom robsa ke mk chuoy choh
96|18|yeung nung haw anakyeam nork( daembi chab ke baoh tomleak  tow knong nork) .
96|19|pho  t y towvinh  chaur anak( mou ham meat) kom thveuteam ke aoy saoh  haey chaur anak saou chout  ning banhchit khluon tow champoh trong choh .
97|1|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban banhchouh kompir kuor an nowknong  yb a l k d  .
97|2|haey tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  yb a l k d  chea avei noh
97|3|yb a l k d  noh ku brasaer cheang muoy pean khe  .
97|4|mea la ai kat cheachraen  ning chi pri l choh mk knong yb noh daoy  mean karoanounhnhat pi mcheasa robsa puokke  daembi anouvotd real batobanhchea .
97|5|nowknong yb noh der  porpenh tow daoy sechakdeisokh sa ndi pheap rhautadl hva cheu rlech laeng  .

98|1|puok del kmean chomnue nei puok aah li ki tab  ning puok mou sh ri kin  min baohbng( pheap kmean chomnue  ning brakear shi ri k)cheadeachkhat rhaut  tealte phosdo tang yeang chbasaleasa ban mokadl puokke .
98|2|( phosdo tang noh) ku anakneasar mneak( mou ham meat)mk pi  a l laoh  delke nung sautr kompir da saatasam( kompir kuor an)
98|3|del nowknong kompir noh ku meanochbab  ning meakra da troemotrauv .
98|4|haey puok del trauv ban ke phdal kompir aoy min del bekbak knea laey  leuklengte kraoypel del phosdo tang da chbasaleasa ban  mokadl puokke bonnaoh .

98|5|haey puokke min trauv ban ke banhchea aoy theu  v avei krawpi aoy puokke korp sakkar champoh a l laoh  daoy chetd smaoh sa  ning troemotrauv  champoh trong  ning brate b tde sa lat  promteang brichcheak hsaa kat noh laey .  haey noh kuchea sasanea da troemotrauv .

98|6|pitabrakd nasa  puok del kmean chomnue nei puok aah li ki tab ning  puok mou sh ri kin  ku se  th t nowknong thanonork cheu han nam  del puokke nowknong  noh chea amt .  puok teangnoh  kuchea puok del akrak bamphot nei satv  lok .
98|7|pitabrakd nasa  banda anak del mean chomnue  ning ban sang  ampeula troemotrauv .  anak teangnoh kuchea anak del la bamphot nei satvalok .

98|8|kar tabasnang robsa puokke now e mcheasa robsa puokke  ku thansuokr at ni n del mean t ne  l cheachraen haur pi kraom vea  daoy puokke sthetnow  tinoh chea amt .  a l laoh ban ylprom cheamuoy puokke . haey  puokke kaban ylprom cheamuoy trong vinh der .  kar tabasnang nih ku  samreab anak del kaotakhlach mcheasa robsa ke .
99|1|nowpel del phendei trauv ban ke thveu aoy ronhchuoy yeang khlangokla .
99|2|haey phendei ban b po  ch nh nouv sakasap teangoasa del mean  nowknong khluon robsa vea  .
99|3|haey mnoussa lok ka niyeay tha  tae mean rueng avei kaet  laeng champoh phendei nih
99|4|now thngai noh  vea nung brakeasabrab nouv ruengreav robsa vea
99|5|piproh mcheasa robsa anak ban banhchea aoy vea thveu dauchnaoh .
99|6|now thngai noh der  mnoussa lok nung chenhpi phnaur mk teang krom  khosa  knea daembi ttuol kar bangheanh aoy kheunh nouv ampeu teanglay robsa  puokke .
99|7|dau che  neah  anak del thveu ampeula saumbi mean tomngon bon lomangthouli  ka ke nung kheunh vea der .
99|8|chamnek e anak del thveuampeu akrak  saumbi mean tomngon bon  lomangthouli ka ke nung meulkheunh vea der .
100|1|a l laoh sbath nung satv seh teanglay del rt teang danghok  nowknong samorphoumi .
100|2|ning satv seh del rt yeang luen chenh phkaphleung tam krachk  robsa vea .
100|3|ning satv seh del vea baol samrouk tow khmangosatrauv teang pruk  prolum .
100|4|haey puokvea thveu aoy thouli hoyotrolom nowchampohmoukh puok  satrauv  .
100|5|haey puokvea samroukchaul tow kandal hvaung satrauv  .
100|6|pitabrakd nasa  mnoussa lok ku rmilkoun champoh mcheasa  robsa ke .
100|7|haey pitabrakd nasa  ke kuchea saksaei leu rueng noh
100|8|piproh ke  kuchea mnoussa del sraleanh tropy sa mb tde yeang  khlang .
